description: Enterprise techniques used by Account Use Policies, ATT&CK mitigation M1036 v1.0
name: Account Use Policies (M1036)

techniques.comment: Set account lockout policies after a certain number of failed login attempts to prevent passwords from being guessed. Too strict a policy may create a denial of service condition and render environments un-usable, with all accounts used in the brute force being locked-out.
